implementation.name: CMP EntityBean Container
implementation.description: Container that implements the EJB 1.1 defined bean-container contract for EntityBeans with container-managed persistence.
implementation.detail: Manages the beans lifecycle as defined in the EJB specification
Applies bean method authorization with help of the SecurityService
Uses Castor JDO for persisting entity instances
Instances are persistable to any datasource Castor JDO supports
The entity to datasource mapping is done in xml using JDOs mapping DTD
